description: A soft-spoken, bespectacled college student who also lives in Ayano`s dormitory. She is often seen trying to reign in Yuka when she is drunk. Ironically, Megumi gets drunk easily, and in that state is even wilder than Yuka, often berating Yamato on how all men are perverts, accusing Yamato of staring at her chest, flashing him, and then slapping him for looking. She has expressed the desire to become married.
name: Matsumoto Megumi
